titleStmt.title: Pedantius Comœdia, olim Cantabrig. acta in Coll. Trin. Nunquàm antehàc typis evulgata.
titleStmt.author: Forset, Edward, 1553?-1630, attributed name.
Wingfield, Anthony, 1550?-1615?, attributed name.
Hawkesworth, Walter, d. 1606, attributed name.
Beard, Thomas, d. 1632, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Excudebat W[illiam] S[tansby] impensis Roberti Mylbourn in Cœmeterio Paulino ad insigne Canis Leporarij,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Edward Forset, to Anthony Wingfield, to Walter Hawkesworth, and to Thomas Beard.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
